field.name: file_path
field.label: File Path
field.notice: The file must match the format. Use relative path to Magento installation, e.g. var/import/products.csv (Make sure folder have correct write permissions - 775 , for more details please see Magento 2 Permissions guide)

field.name: date_format
field.label: Date Format
field.notice: Date format to attach at end of the file. Enter php date format default is 'Y-m-d-hi'.
